author: nurfikri89
body:
Backport of #44479 

#### Original PR description:

This PR adds the number of B/C-hadrons branches for `GenJetAK8` and `GenJet` tables . The same branches are removed from the `FatJet` table.  Addresses the Issue [here](https://gitlab.cern.ch/cms-nanoAOD/xpog-coordination/-/issues/68).

#### PR validation:

passes the usual runTheMatrix test: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`
title: [NanoAOD] Backport of #44479 (Add number of B & C hadrons for GenJetAK8 and GenJet) to 14_0_X
